name: Earth Defence (introtogamesproduction)
description:
This is a prototype of my Space Shooter Project. It will need some bug fixes in the future.

You have hijacked an alien ship, now it is your job to defend earth from its invaders. take control of the on screen power ups to make yourself smaller, and more maneuverable . But watch out! this tech is still a prototype and there is no reversing your actions!
